amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for the Afghanistan Infrastructure Fund by $139 million and applies the savings to the Spending Reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 29 printed in House Report 113-170 to reduce the Afghanistan Infrastructure Fund from $279 million to $140 million and transfers the savings to deficit reduction.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A029) Agreed to by recorded vote: 249 - 173 (Roll no. 389).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A029) Agreed to by recorded vote: 249 - 173 (Roll no. 389).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. Cohen.
